scripts.client: yarn workspace @pilabs/builder build-client && yarn workspace @pilabs/client start
scripts.server: yarn workspace @pilabs/builder build-server && yarn workspace @pilabs/server start
scripts.discovery: yarn workspace @pilabs/builder build-discovery && yarn workspace @pilabs/discovery start
scripts.mf: yarn workspace @pilabs/builder build-mf mf1 && yarn workspace @pilabs/builder build-mf mf2
